page.title: 19Life styles in Manningham.
page.content: Young peoples clothing is colourful. Hair is coloured red,pink and green.Not all Asian girls have copied the new hair{fashions.}Rock and Roll has changed to Pop and Break Dancing. Girls wear more makeup,taking care of their skins.Most Muslims prefer their own{culture,}going to the Mosque, wearing Salwar and Kameez.The Muslim way of life is different,marriages are still arranged by parents.Hair is dyed red after the Hajj.Muslims eat savoury {food,}curry and rice.Manningham has many shops and cafes selling Asian, English,West Indian and Mexican food providing a variety for all.The quality of life is improving.Most people think that they eat better and live better.Gambling on horses,dogs and machines is popular but can lose a lot of money.
